## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G17380](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G17380)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtHPCL, HPCL</u>
- **Gene Name:** 2-hydroxy-phytanoyl-CoA lyase
- **Description:**   Thiamine pyrophosphate dependent pyruvate decarboxylase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2167205
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
